title: MycroFleet Sensor Network
description: Low-cost distributed sensors for smallholder farms; embedded firmware + backend APIs.

title: KB2040 Macropad (TinyUSB HID)
description: Custom firmware with multi-layer mapping, OLED UI, and USB HID.

title: Automated Mushroom 3D Scanning
description: Automated 3-axis gantry system with rotary table for capturing photogrammetry images and generating 3D models.

title: Linear Measurement Device
description: MTE-201 class project: automated linear measurement with 0.6mm accuracy using stepper motor and limit switch.

title: Sonos Controller
description: Battery-powered custom controller for hands-free Sonos speaker control and grouping, with Raspberry Pi server bridge.

title: Automated KUKA Camera Calibration System
description: PC-controlled KUKA manipulator system for automated camera calibration with stereo imaging and lens distortion modeling.

title: “Love The Wine You’re With” Sign
description: Custom LED sign build: design, fabrication, and control.

title: Hotdog Robot
description: Automated hotdog prep robot: sensing, actuation, and control.
